shrineOfMagicMystery.name: Shrine of Magic Mystery

rewards.message:
{Shrine of Magic Mystery}

You come across an ancient shrine attended by a group of ascetic hermits. In exchange for your protection, they agree to teach you a spell - %s.

shrineOfMagicMystery.onVisitedMessage:
{Shrine of Magic Mystery}

You come across an ancient shrine attended by a group of ascetic hermits. In exchange for your protection, they agree to teach you a spell - %s. Unfortunately, you already have knowledge of this spell, so there is nothing more for them to teach you.
